title: Challenge - can't identify this font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414034049im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontToIdenityf_5863.png)
 Hi all, had some difficulty trying to identify this font. It feels something inbetween a GOTHAM and CIRCE BOLD but I'm a little lost as the uppercase A doesn't fit. Appreciate all of your help in advance, and yes I know I'll kick myself when I find out which it is! :)

Best,

Si
author: helpetica
